Cuerpo: MIME-Version: 1.0 Server: CERN/3.0 Date: Monday, 25-Nov-96 00:17:38 GMT Content-Type: text/html Content-Length: 4604 Last-Modified: Friday, 02-Aug-96 01:36:41 GMT Document Listing NCSTRL Documentation On-Line Documents to Peruse For more information about NCSTRL Who and what is NCSTRL , anyway? How do I participate in NCSTRL?. I'd like to know more about the handle service , which is used for document naming in NCSTRL. Installing and maintaining an NCSTRL-standard site NCSTRL-standard sites run a Dienst server, which manages their document collection, allows searches on it, and provides a user interface gateway to the entire NCSTRL collection. How do I download and install the Dienst software? How do I find out and install new releases? New release announcements will be sent to this list. Check out the release notes for a history and status of current Dienst releases. Installing and maintaining an NCSTRL-lite site NCSTRL-lite sites maintain an FTP archive of their documents and bibliograhic files. How do I participate and download the software to become a NCSTRL-lite site? I'd like some more details on searching for documents . More technical information. An overview of the NCSTRL architecture . Another Dienst technical report describing the Dienst architecture. A technical report about WATERS , the technical foundation for NCSTRL-lite. Check this out for other sources of CS material on the Internet.
